#This is frequently used commands in git. 
##Start. Create branch and repo
* `$ git checkout -b branchname` = create new branch
* `$  git remote add origin https://github.com/your-user-name-goes-here/test-repo.git` = creating new repo
* `$ git pull origin master` = pulls from remote repo to your local one
* `$ git config --global user.name "John Doe"` = configuring your username
* `$ git config --global user.email johndoe@example.com` = configuring your email
